nf_ingredient_statement: Whole Grain Corn, Corn Meal, Sugar, Corn Starch, Salt, Baking Soda, Brown Sugar Syrup, Freshness Preserved by BHT. Vitamins and Minerals: Calcium Carbonate, Iron and Zinc (Mineral Nutrients), Vitamin C (Sodium Ascorbate), a B Vitamin (Niacinamide), Vitamin B1 (Thiamin Mononitrate), Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxine Hydrochloride), Vitamin A (Palmitate), Vitamin B2 (Riboflavin), a B Vitamin (Folic Acid), Vitamin B12, Vitamin D3. Gluten free. Gluten free.
